Name: Imprisoned Hyperion
About the game: Imprisoned hyperion is an immersivesim, first-person rpg with survival elements. Plot You will find yourself in a dark and mysterious dungeon after the end of the world. Life on the surface is no longer possible and people have gone underground. But things didn't go as planned. The humans had to start a war with the underground inhabitants, which they lost. However, you are not their savior or hero. After all, you have your own, more important purpose in this world, and most of its inhabitants will never understand you. Regardless of what happens next, you will achieve your goal. Features The dark dungeons of Hyperion are home to many dangerous creatures that will drain your strength. Act wisely, look for food and safe places to regain your strength. Play it your way There are different ways to succeed. Poison the food in the kitchen to avoid the battle, or kill the mage who gave you the task to get the reward without completing the task. Your adventure has a definite goal, and it doesn't matter how you achieve it. Use your wits and your ability to improvise.
